name: Quarantine (itch) (sunflowersrcute, blindfishkid, rhaelys7)
description:
YOU’RE IN QUARANTINE

In this Point & Click game you must deal with yourself for a week without leaving your apartment.

TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF

Keep an eye on your status bars and be careful to not let them drop. Therefore, you can find objects in your apartment and use them individually or even combine them.

DEAL WITH HIS PAST

You must face up to the challenges of the grumpy protagonist and manage his moods. Inside William’s apartment you’ll uncover memories revealing his suppressed past.

Created by Anna Rudelt, Nico Brockmann, Nora Schulze und Angelina Damm
